extension/post-game/data/arena/faction-c.orig: Refight several challenging battles found during your endgame quests!
extension/post-game/data/arena/faction-c.text: Affrontez de nouveau plusieurs combats difficiles trouvés dans vos quêtes de fin de jeu !

extension/post-game/data/arena/faction-c.orig:
Defeat the \c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/jellyfish-booze]s and \v[combat.name.heat/special/heat-golem-booze]\c[0] in \c[3]the Distillery of \v[area.heat-village.name]\c[0]!
Throw \c[3]ice into the ovens to deactivate the shields\c[0] and \c[3]onto the machine to prevent overheating\c[0]!
extension/post-game/data/arena/faction-c.text:
Combattez les \c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/jellyfish-booze]s et l'\v[combat.name.heat/special/heat-golem-booze]\c[0] dans \c[3]la Distillerie de \v[area.heat-village.name]\c[0] !
Lancez de \c[3]la glace dans les fours pour désactiver les boucliers\c[0] et \c[3]dans la machine pour l'empêcher de surchauffer\c[0] !

extension/post-game/data/arena/faction-c.orig:

extension/post-game/data/arena/faction-c.orig:
Work with a salty helper to defeat \c[3]\v[combat.name.jungle/special/ghost-toxic]\c[0] at the entrance to \v[area.jungle-city.name]!
\c[3]Defend your ally\c[0] while \c[3]they weaken the enemy\c[0]!
extension/post-game/data/arena/faction-c.text:
Travaillez avec une assistante salée pour vaincre le \c[3]\v[combat.name.jungle/special/ghost-toxic]\c[0] à l'entrée du \v[area.jungle-city.name] !
\c[3]Défendez votre alliée\c[0] pendant \c[3]qu'elle affaiblit l'ennemi\c[0] !
extension/post-game/data/arena/faction-c.note: what's the thing with the gender ? de is masculine and en is now inclusive
